top_comments.comment: Because of the economic crisis and rate of unemployment, now is the best time to invest and make money💯

comments_since_last_sample.body: Isn’t it time to get back to the days of, We Report, You Decide and Fair and Balanced instead of, We’ll Complain, You Just Listen?

The bar has already been raised. You no longer have to believed that all the hardships and oppression inflicted upon you now is nothing but just a "NEW NORMAL". We The People already knew that We Can Do and Deserve Better!

I used to watch fox News every day. Then on the evening of the election, a fox news "reporter called the election for jb with only 36% of the votes, counted in Arizona, and jb was only leading by 1%. Now the narrative is always, or was always, pro jb. It's the last time I watched the last holdout for truth. Fox let us all down and can't be trusted any more. At least not Brett Baer, and a few others. LETS GO BRANDON!
